mapper.select: select a.id, a.name, b.id, b.name, b.pw from members a join members b on(a.id = b.id)
select id, pw, name, email from members where id = #{id}
select id, pw, name, email from members order by id

select id, pw, name, email from members
and name - #{name}
and id = 1
and id = 2
mapper.insert: insert into members (id, pw, name, email) values (#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{email})
mapper.update: update members set pw = #{pw}, name = #{name}, email = #{email} where id = #{id}
